name: AUGUSTIN ST CLOU
description: THE INTERNATIONAL KING OF VOODOO, PROMOTING THE HAITIAN CULTURE WORLDWIDE, VOODOO SOCIETY.
sampleDescriptions:
The voodoo is not EVIL!
"Big social problem" for the desperately poor country, arguing that the religion offers "magic" but no real solutions to a population deprived of justice and a political voice.
